description.raw:
See pull request #1739

Allows plugins, tools, and events to be built on windows. Fixed dll imports/exports, added windows specfic includes (mostly winsock), and fixed code style to work on windows. Everything could be built if it were linked statically, but this is not what we want. This will be fixed as soon as some circular dependencies are resolved.For now plugin and event libraries are kept as SHARED so that it will build on Linux.
